title: How are things with you?
body:
[](http://img05.deviantart.net/867b/i/2016/238/0/2/yorick_by_albertoorso-dafc8fc.jpg)
{{champion:83}} Everyone I know is dead... how are things with you?
{{champion:236}} My wife's soul has been kidnapped by a psychopathic, sadistic demon warden who is probably a rapist.
{{champion:157}} I was forced to kill all my friends and family because I was framed for the murder of the elder who was also close to me. Wait a sec... this isn't alcoholics anonymous, is it? 
{{champion:23}} I watched my entire village be slaughtered and right when I rose to take my revenge, nobody opposed me.
{{champion:110}} Same here except with a demon pit that burned off my pants and replaced them.
{{champion:131}} Everyone I know wants to kill me. And I am trying to force myself to like moon pies, but it is difficult.
{{champion:41}} My ship and arm got blown up by a card shark and a guy with a shotgun chewing nicotine gum.
{{champion:429}} I was sentenced to death by my king and literally stabbed in the back as I watched my home turn into an undead wasteland, and I slowly lose myself every day in this writhing mass of souls. I can't even make decisions anymore, restaurants have become hell.
{{champion:240}} Everyone I know is a lie... shut it, Skaarl.
{{champion:267}} My people are probably already died because I dicked around here instead of finding the moonstone.
{{champion:33}} The weight of millions watching me forces me to keep silent and emotionless to give them hope in a strong champion.
{{champion:133}} I lost my brother and mentally replaced him with an eagle.
{{champion:91}} I think I was once somebody's brother but was considered dead.
{{champion:112}} I try time and again to help people but they consider me a madman and try to kill me. Also my third arm wants an allowance from me now.
{{champion:26}} I don't even know if I'm in this timeline. Wait, what is that blue box flying around here...?
{{champion:238}} Hot Topic near my house got closed down the other day and my stupid mom kept bothering me with dumb sentimental stuff.
{{champion:83}} Ok, we'll convene next week. Same time.
{{champion:32}} Guys, what about m-
{{champion:83}} HAVE A NICE WEEK, EVERYONE!
*Everyone walks out*
{{champion:32}} ...I wish I could say I had a home to go to...

Fin

replies.body:
{{champion:13}} I keep getting resurrected, only to have my spells change...

{{champion:103}} I keep finding lewd fan art of me...

{{champion:38}} My joke hasn't made sense for years...

{{champion:16}} My backstory keeps changing...

{{champion:83}} I haven't had a change of clothes in six years...
Think about his joke in this way;  He tried to silence his mother, so she took it away.
{{champion:92}} All my Summoners are toxic and then people blame me for it.

{{champion:17}}  it's okay mumu, i know what it's like to be invisible

{{champion:28}}  you're one to talk little hamster man

{{champion:32}}  oh great, now the voices in my head are back... 

{{champion:36}}  Mundo like voices!!! 

{{champion:9}}  i think i'll let you suffer for a lil while

{{champion:32}}  ..did the scarecrow just talk?

{{champion:9}}  ...

{{champion:17}}  ...

{{champion:28}}  ...

{{champion:33}}  ... ok

{{champion:240}}  drink some mushroom juice! it'll cheer you up! shut up skaarl i already gave you some!

{{champion:117}}  that tasted purple...

{{champion:45}}  heh kek 

{{champion:18}}  is that a rocket in your pocket? or are ya just happy to see me ;) 

{{champion:427}}  oh my, yes hello there! what a bunch of happy lil...

{{champion:41}}  BARRELS!! 

{{champion:32}}  oh man, not again...

_GP ults everyone _

{{champion:266}} No one takes me seriously, they say I'm just a Tryndamere clone even though I was born before he was!
{{champion:103}} I used to just want to be human and eat the souls out of peop-le, but since then I developed a conscience, and can't stop feeling guilty about death fucking people.
{{champion:84}} No one respects me when I'm strong and when I'm weak everyone is happy.
{{champion:12}} People try to keep me as a slave. Or milk me.
{{champion:32}} No one gives me a chance to sho-
{{champion:34}} I've literally died more times than I can count. Its hurts dammit.
{{champion:1}} Whenever I'm the first to die someone makes a perverted joke.
{{champion:22}} I'm married to a lunatic and the people I try to help want to murder me.
{{champion:136}} I was enslaved by a mountain who made me create such an ugly arrangement of lights... ugh, tacky.
{{champion:268}} My best childhood friend stabbed me in the back, destroyed my entire civilization including my wife and children, AFTER I gave him what he wanted from me.
{{champion:432}} Bwaaaamn! (Everyone treats me like a lazy stoner...)
{{champion:53}} I can find love for everyone else, but there is no love for a golem T.T
{{champion:63}} People keep trying to blow out my head and make a wish.
{{champion:201}} Actually I'm good. Could use a glass of milk though.
{{champion:51}} People think I'm some secret dominatrix and my partner is a damned maverick.
{{champion:164}} My brother tricked me into giving up my humanity and becoming an unfeeling killing machine.
{{champion:69}} I used to have legs and be drop dead gorgeous. Used to...
{{champion:31}} There's not enough food here.
{{champion:42}} HELP, I'M HAVING FLASHBACKS!
{{champion:122}} People keep making me go off to war when all I want to do is shoot hoops.
{{champion:131}} My people consider me a vile heretic. Ignorant thralls...
{{champion:36}} Mundo? Ssllllp
{{champion:119}} I can't watch myself sleep Q.Q
{{champion:245}} My friends are either dead, went insane, or sold out and became cops.
{{champion:60}} I have spider legs growing out of my back and have become a slave to a gigantic arachnid.
{{champion:28}} I'm forced to wear this ridiculous outfit and HIGH HEELS into combat!
{{champion:81}} Everyone thinks I'm gay for Taric but I really just want to date Lux, except she pretends she hardly knows me.
{{champion:9}} I haven't got a brain...
{{champion:114}} I killed my father. Not sad about it, just felt like I should chip in my fair share.
{{champion:105}} People keep sticking hooks with worms on them in my mouth.
{{champion:3}} They're about to rip my mind out of my body and force it into a new one! Please, someone help!
{{champion:41}} I lost my arm, my ship, my city and... well, my crew too, but that's not a big deal.
{{champion:86}} I want to go and elope with Katarina, but then my nation would disown me and probably try to kill me.
{{champion:150}} Where am I? Who are you? No, stop it... STOP IT! REAGDSGHERGRWSD!! *breaking glass*
{{champion:79}} I ran outta beer... *hic*
{{champion:104}} They took away my cigar.
{{champion:120}} Some jackass plugged my spine into a horses neck, and now I'm a damned undead centaur.
{{champion:74}} People keep telling me to raise... well, something call "dongers", but I'm not entire certain what that is. I have several hypotheses...
{{champion:420}} The tentacles never leave me alone. EVER.
{{champion:39}} I died and some crazy lady brought me back. Oh, also, everyone keep trying to hit me with nerf toys. Its annoying.
{{champion:427}} Who wants a hug?! :D
{{champion:40}} No one knows my lore, but they all know I worked a phone sex line to pay my way through college.
{{champion:59}} LeBlanc keeps posing as me. Copycat...
{{champion:24}} Who wants a piece of th... uh... you know I just... I just don't want to man. I'm just not feeling it anymore. And I'm sick of this stupid mask that makes me look like I have too many damned eyes!
{{champion:126}} Viktor stole my shit.
{{champion:202}} I wasn't the forth person on this list...... *loads gun*
{{champion:222}} Fishbones wont stop trying to apologize after I blow stuff up!
{{champion:429}} I'm possibly the most petty, vindictive person ever, and I just can't help myself...
{{champion:43}} No one even knows who I am, but they keep calling me a bitch.
{{champion:30}} Every time I sing I bore the audience to death. Everyone's a critic...
{{champion:38}} I have a breathing problem and someone called me... Da... Dark Vaper, was it?
{{champion:55}} I really want to jump that goodie-two-shoes' bones, but then everyone I know would try to kill me.
{{champion:10}} My sister hates me.
{{champion:85}} People keep throwing red and white balls at me.
{{champion:121}} Some lion man is trying to murder me, but I'm just looking for a snack.
{{champion:203}} Turns out there quite a few people around here into bestiality.
{{champion:240}} GET OFFEN MAH DANG LAWN YOU BASTARDS!
{{champion:96}} I'M SO HUNGRY!
{{champion:7}} Honestly, I feel where Eve is coming from. This outfit is sooo not battle ready.
{{champion:64}} I lost my eyesight when I set myself on fire. Honestly, was kind of expecting to die.
{{champion:89}} People keep acting like Diana and I hook up in secret. I fucking hate Diana!
{{champion:127}} I have the WORST frostbite.
{{champion:236}} I stole Thresh's bike... Now he rides my wife to work...
{{champion:117}} Purple glitter fuzzy muffin sky!
{{champion:99}} There's a disturbing amount of rumors circulating about me and Garen. Especially after Game of Thrones came out...
{{champion:54}} I got a copyright notice for trying to quote Dwayne Johnson.
{{champion:90}} My pets all die within seconds of me getting them.
{{champion:57}} I'm a tree, I'm not supposed to even be able to talk. PUT ME BACK DAMMIT!
{{champion:11}} Honestly, I'm just do bored of everything to do with life. Comes with living so damn long.
{{champion:21}} For some reason, everyone thinks I'm a slut. I'm probably one of the only female champions who is actually a virgin, you judgemental tards!
{{champion:82}} I can't actually play guitar :(
{{champion:25}} My sister hates me.
{{champion:267}} So many guys want to hook up with me, but they're only interested in blowjobs...
{{champion:75}} My brother wants to kill me, has for centuries now, and I'm afraid that one day I'll have to put him down.
{{champion:111}} They left me. No one leaves me anymore...
{{champion:76}} I'm not actually that old, stop making cougar and cub jokes!
{{champion:56}} I wish I had legs...
{{champion:20}} The yeti wont let me go home to my parents, please send help!
{{champion:2}} I feel like I have to fight for honor... but I don't know why.
{{champion:61}} I don't have feelings anymore.
{{champion:80}} I just wanted to be a baker, but they gave me this bronze age tech and told me to wage war against people who have sniper rifles... assholes.
{{champion:78}} I can't find the hero, and this hammer is so damned heavy! Well, it's supposed to be. Guess I'm stronger than I look, huh?
{{champion:133}} My brother's dead, my bird's name is Valor, but my name also translates into "valor"... what the hell is this?
{{champion:33}} Not okay...
{{champion:421}} Raaawrr! "I have sand in my vagina!"
{{champion:58}} My brother locked me in a tomb for centuries with an insane mage and he still acts like HE'S the victim in all this!
{{champion:107}} That was my good eye...
{{champion:92}} Yasuo stole my wind style.
{{champion:68}} Tristana doesn't want to go out with me...
{{champion:13}} I'm bald, blue, old, and the only one who seems to be doing a damn thing to save the world. Yeah things are kinda rough right now. I need an ale...
{{champion:113}} I'm getting saddle sore from being forced to ride this pig ALL THE TIME!
{{champion:35}} Everyone keeps calling my Heath Ledger or Mark Hamill.
{{champion:98}} My adopted brother murdered my father.
{{champion:102}} I'm a half-breed who everyone looks at as a freak. I'm not even sure how my parents coupling is even possible! Seems like it would be really uncomfortable in addition to disgusting.
{{champion:27}} My bones are exposed through the missing parts of my skin.
{{champion:14}} Where the hell is my foot?!
{{champion:15}} My great-great-great... uh... however amny greats' grandfather keeps pressuring me to join the family business, but I'm really just not that into politics.
{{champion:72}} I miss my kind V.V
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:16}} I used to be a star... now I have fucking hooves!
{{champion:50}} This bird... is... controlling my... mind. Please, oh god... hel- LET'S JUST MORPH AND EAT THEM!
{{champion:134}} All of this show of power is just my way of compensating for the loneliness I feel due to having no friends.
{{champion:223}} I'm not a frog, and I'm not clogged. I'm not a toad, and you can't even unload those! And I don't ribbit! Now get in my mouth!
{{champion:163}} No one ever taught me to tweeze my eyebrows...
{{champion:91}} Who the hell is Ezio?
{{champion:44}} Have you got any idea how annoying it is to have millions of people forcing you to say how "outrageous" gems are over and over again for years? I'm still a little upset about it.
{{champion:17}} I'm not interested in sharing right now. There's charlies all over the jungle man. We gotta flush 'em out. Get into overlapping fields of fire, you know what I mean? *is talking to a mushroom*
{{champion:412}} Ever since she moved in with me, all Senna has done is nag... uh... I miss being single.
{{champion:18}} Rumble wont stop staring at my ass, and Teemo thinks I'm his "bunkmate" from the war in South-East Ionia. Between them and having to clean my gun, my day pretty much leaves no time for down time.
{{champion:48}} Sometimes I think people don't appreciate how hard I work, you know? Like, its tough being King! I've gotta bash heads, crush skulls, make ice, and no one ever offers to help.
{{champion:23}} I'm the King, but everyone listens to my wife. Couple that with my anger management problems and... uh, I dunno. Honestly, some nights I wake up at Gragas' place and I don't even remember how many I'd drank the night before...
{{champion:4}} I'd tell you 'bout mah troubles, but ran outta room before I co

>{{champion:11}}  Honestly, I'm just do bored of everything to do with life. Comes with living so damn long.

Took me too long to remember the name of that Yi comic...

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/8cfcd575f4bffb4460dcfed7bd81ade5.png

{{champion:8}} A feral mutt keeps chasing me whenever I go outside.
{{champion:105}} My entire civilisation has vanished, and not even the lore team knows why.
{{champion:59}} I can't get out of this crater.
{{champion:2}} I'm too awesome to die.
{{champion:69}}  My precious shoe collection is now worthless.
{{champion:164}} I know that feeling all too well.
{{champion:432}} _sad chiming_
{{champion:164}} Shut it, sack-man!
https://images.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=http%3A%2F%2F24.media.tumblr.com%2Ftumblr_me7n4cnXIt1rm7b5lo1_500.gif&f=1

{{champion:266}} Everyone thinks I wear lipstick.
{{champion:107}} Depth perception loss is a BITCH.
{{champion:58}} Every time I cry they're crocodile tears.
{{champion:240}} The trees have stopped talking to me...
{{champion:57}} That's because your lizard kept peeing on me!
{{champion:240}} I THOUGHT Y'SAID YER A SAND SHARK!
{{champion:421}} *Crickle crackle*
{{champion:240}} Well, hello there, pretty bird. Nice wings.
http://files.gamebanana.com/img/ico/sprays/530-90_57d98ce965fe3.jpg

{{champion:150}} Shushu moka shaba nana waba nocka ;__;

(everyone I know and love are dead, I'm thousands of years out of place, my boomerang is no longer "cutting edge technology" and I destroy anyone and anything in my way when I get angry ;__;)
I think you should stop using google translate. He actually said "burger waffle fries which one is which wtf even."
my boomerang is no longer cutting edge technology xD that got me

What if Valor isn't even real and {{champion:133}} is just hallucinating the whole thing.
"Go Valor!" Quinn, what?
"Gouge their eyes Valor" Who is Valor?
"My bird" Quinn-
"Get em Valor" THERE'S NO BIRD

Then how does she go so fast with her ult... hm...

*Riding a tricycle*
{{champion:133}} SCREEEEEECH!

{{champion:14}} I think I was once considered a hero... But now I'm nothing but an undead monster who only "lives" to kill.
{{champion:102}} I never knew my mother. My father was a dragon who was killed by another dragon. The people that helped me kill said dragon in revenge are potnentially only using me for my dragon powers.
{{champion:31}} The sun. It burns!
{{champion:101}} My master and best friend since childhood promised me freedom from slavery but went "SIKE"
{{champion:163}} I joined the Noxians, went "nope", and now I'm trying to return to my tribe which may or may not be enslaved to the revived Sun King.

{{champion:163}} And I can only hope this sun king is at least a good king.
#*Meanwhile, in Shurima...*

{{champion:268}} *Clutching his staff like a microphone*
SHURIMA, BABY, ARE YA COMIN' HOME FOR CHRISTMAS?

{{champion:75}} ...are you finished?

{{champion:268}} NOT YET, I STILL HAVE THREE MORE SONGS.
the emperors new grove
I need this to become a meme.

_There are despots and dictators_
_Political manipulators_
_There are blue bloods with the intellects of fleas_
_There are kings and petty tyrants_
_Who are so lacking in refinement_
_They'd be better suited swinging from the trees_

_He was born and raised to rule_
_No one has ever been this cool_
_In a thousands years of aristocracy_
_An enigma and a mystery_
_In Ancient Shuriman history_
_The quintessence of perfection that is he_

{{champion:75}} Emperor, it's really cool that you can create a sand singer rather than a soldier, but can you please tell him to give it a rest? I am dog tired.

{{champion:268}} THERE ARE STILL VERSES LEFT.

_He's the sovereign of the sand nation_
_He's the emperor of creation_
_He's the sandiest emperor to Ascend_
_And after years of Xerath scheming_
_The emperor was truly steaming_
_So he cast him out of his glorius sight_

{{champion:75}} ...That's not what happened.

_What's his name?_
_Azir, Azir (That's his name)_
_Azir (The Emperor of the Sands!)_
_Azir, Azir (Awesome King of Sand!)_
_Azir (Yeah)_

{{champion:268}} _Rocks to beat, then backs into Taliyah who walked in to protest his rule._ YOU THREW OFF MY GROOVE!
{{champion:75}} I'm sorry young one, but you threw off the Emperor's groove.
{{champion:163}} Soooorry! _Azir ults her out of a window._
perfect

>{{champion:238}} Hot Topic near my house got closed down the other day and my stupid mom kept bothering me with dumb sentimental stuff.

#My sides have left the building

{{champion:427}}  Splendid!

{{champion:83}} Then why the hell are you here?
{{champion:427}} Daisy here's feeling under the weather.

http://gph.is/2eDpuE3
https://media.giphy.com/media/g5KhmX06Q0XBu/giphy.gif
Why is thresh a rapist?
He's the thing under your bed.
{{champion:143}} I may actually be the only person in this entire universe that's doing fine, saved my life, got new abilities and a purpose... Thanks for asking.

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/c2e0cabd73704658881293047217b8bd.jpg

>[Sexy Bisex Plant](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/xKGYZayT-how-are-things-with-you?comment=0012)

...but just please admit you're not a _too_ good plant:

http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/weird-but-obvious-body-facts-allergies-dont-like-plant-sex.jpeg

:(

Might be the reason why I don't have allergies... Interesting.

(Also that comic makes fun of me on so many levels it offends me, WHO MADE THAT?!)

Zooming WAY in on the watermark in the bottom-right corner:
https://www.tumblr.com/search/ask%20zyra%20thecuriousflower

Btw., your name _does_ check out:

http://orig15.deviantart.net/7294/f/2013/294/6/2/ask_diana__015_by_shadow_hunter446-d6rap8f.jpg

My, my...you really have thought this through! I'm actually surprised. :O
Every meme I can think of is covered by that not exactly complicated name.

My hat's off to you, Sir/Ma'am.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CzU0Q9xUoAA65_O.jpg

----------

But as a personal request, can you please NOT photosynthesize with Maokai nearby me in the following months. 

I'd appreciate it.

http://img13.deviantart.net/7d7f/i/2014/249/8/9/zyra_and_maokai_cosplay__the_harvest_is_upon_us_by_nobodyyyyy-d7y6hmq.png

It's Sir (although plants usually possess both genders so you could say I'm... Bisex *chuckles*)

Maokai is an enemy, be sure we won't.

And my name actually isn't that thought through as you think, sorry to disappoint you, it's actually just that I think I'm Sexy, I'm Bisexual and I love Plants - which is the reason I main Zyra since I started playing xD But THANK YOU for the Tumblr link, that is **awesome**!

>And my name actually isn't that thought through as you think, sorry to disappoint you, it's actually just that I think I'm Sexy

Not a problem - it's what YOU think about yourself that's important. The rest is nobody else's business. :)
_I think the nick is great! And with an icon to match._

https://lh3.ggpht.com/FkPTaJGq0icz2sj9UQTlVhsWYu3RosomzwkY4WGkQ_7CVmb8ynSfplsUjIN7Bk1ZiA=h900

>It's Sir, I'm Bisexual and I love Plants.

I had a feeling this was about the truth of it. But I didn't want to spoil anything by making presumptions (possibly embarrass myself massively in the process!). But more importantly, it would ruin the meme, were I to make said presumptions. :)

Have fun with the Ask Zyra Tumblr - I still don't know what to make of Tumblr links (it feels like it's pretty much NSFW, yet facts shows the opposite...).

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Btw., there are a couple others of the same variety (though covering other champions):
http://ask-ahri-sempai.tumblr.com/
http://dianamoonfall.tumblr.com/

https://i01.fotocdn.net/s23/82/public_pin_l/386/2576318801.jpg
{{champion:99}} I'm doing fine! _spams laugh_
{{champion:44}} Except I stole your boyfriend and your whole nation hates the only thing you are good at.
Is there any cannon supporting that Quinn and Talon are siblings? I know its a popular fanfic plot, but I havent seen anything official on it.

In Quinn's teaser she has notes showing a lot of insight and interest in Talon's procedures and style, even noting somebody's precise movements were not Talon's because he would not have done it that way.

And it's not like she was explicitly shown to be assigned to following a specific agent of Noxus.
{{champion:82}} i wanna conquer and kill, but people keep just running away...
Kalista visited the Blessed Isles, she didn't actually live there, FYI.

{{champion:22}} My tribe tried to murder me, but i murdered them first.
{{champion:51}} My parents got kidnapped, now im obsessed with catching criminals 
{{champion:24}} Literally no one knows anything about me other than im from Icathia
{{champion:202}} Im a psychopath
{{champion:101}} Murdered my best friend even though he did what he promised
{{champion:127}} im a witch who wants to bring back demonic ice like things

> The weight of millions watching me forces me to keep silent and emotionless to give them hope in a strong champion.

Did you play Breath of the Wild? :C

Never played it. But I technically did?
